title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series - 1v1 - Starting Tommorrow 9am

embed.description: Welcome to the Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series. This tournament is a single elimination 1v1 event.

body:
Just a reminder that the first tournament  for Digital Puppet Masters(DPM) starts tomorrow at 9am.

For the already registered players check in will be open from 8am and be available up until the tournament starts. Please be sure to complete your check-in in reasonable time and be ready for your first match when the tournament starts.

For everyone else registration for this tournament  is still open, just follow link above to register.

Note: - In the interest of fairness to the people already registered, late registrations will not be accepted, so don't leave it until the last minute if you are interested in participating in this event. Sign up now!
